model

Class Playlist

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Playlist
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrivatePlaylist, PublicPlaylist, RestrictedPlaylist

    public class Playlist
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Duration durationP 
      protected java.lang.String genre 
      protected java.lang.String name 
      protected int song 
      protected Song[] songsInPlaylist 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Playlist(java.lang.String name)
      Constructor that creates a new playlist with duration 0:0:0, empty genre, an empty array for the songs and a counter for the added songs

      • Playlist

        public Playlist(java.lang.String name)
        Constructor that creates a new playlist with duration 0:0:0, empty genre, an empty array for the songs and a counter for the added songs
        Parameters:
        name - playlist name

    • Method Detail

      • getGenre

        public java.lang.String getGenre()
        Returns the genre of the playlist
        Returns:
        genre which is a String with the genres contained

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns name of the playlist
        Returns:
        name playlist name

        public void setGenre(java.lang.String genre)

      • setDurationP

        public void setDurationP(Duration duration)
        sets the duration of the playlist
        Parameters:
        duration - is the playlist duration

      • addSong

        public void addSong(Song newSong,
                    java.lang.String genre)
        addSong is a method that adds a song to the playlist. It updates the genre and the duration of the playlist
        pre: songsInPlaylist array is initialized. There is free indexes in the array
        pos: song++. There's a new object in the songs array in the first empty found position. genre and durationP are updated
        Parameters:
        newSong - is the song to be added
        genre - is the playlist genre before adding the new song. genre!=null. genre!=""

      • updateGenre

        public java.lang.String updateGenre(java.lang.String genre)
        updateGenre is a method that updates the genre of the playlist if it's needed
        pre: songsInPlaylist array is initialized
        pos: genre is updated
        Parameters:
        genre - is the genre before updating
        Returns:
        genre is a String with a new genre added if needed

      • checkSong

        public boolean checkSong(java.lang.String title)
        checkSong is a method that checks if a song is already added to the playlist
        pre: songsInPlaylist array is initialized
        pos:
        Parameters:
        title - is the song name to be consulted. title!=null. title!=""
        Returns:
        found true if it's already added, otherwise false

      • infoPlaylist

        public java.lang.String infoPlaylist()
        Method that produces a String with the information of a playlist
        Returns:
        infoPlaylist String with playlist information
